body:
Hello, so since Avicus has an Youtube account and an Twitter account I thought, why not an Official Avicus Instagram Account!? Well anyways I would be managing the account but if any other staff members or fellow players would like to help with the account feel free to ask. I know there are other accounts for Avicus but I'd like to make an Official one if I can. The username name would be @TheAvicusNetwork. I'll also try to post daily.
Things I'll post
-screenshots
-any official news
-anything staff members or regular players would like me to post
One post I already have ready:
http://i.imgur.com/uoWRENS.jpg
any feedback? :)
Edit:
unofficial but still follow it!

title: Avicus IG Account?

replies.body: Thing is, you cannot make an official account since you are one of the second lowest ranks out of all of avicus, you would need AT LEAST a manager or above to make it and take care of it, like avicore for example, if they wanted to post the exact time they would have it come out they would have to tell you first so you could announce it on instagram -1, you may do a unofficial one where you post info that has just come out to the public

I agree with both vladthegreat100 and MissCarmel. Since avicus is owned by funky, he should probably be the one to handle it if he wants to.
I don't really think this is necessary because there is already twitter and YouTube, and it would be pointless to have another one.
Sorry if I seem rude, I am not trying to.

replies.body:
I like this too. It's really not a bad thing. 
Seriously, it's only doing good for Funky, by giving Avicus more popularity. 

I seriously don't understand why you guys are being so harsh, it's just a fun social media site. 
I understand that she doesn't have the right to do this, but being harsh on her isn't necessary at all. She's giving an idea, she hasn't done it yet.
 
@Vlad
I do believe that your first comment was unnecessary and naive. I think you highly estimate yourself. Being a diamond and a gold doesn't make a difference. They're in the same category. Your comment could be inferred that your of a better status than she is, which isn't true. Otherwise, I think your comment was nice... though that first one should be removed, I think.
